Name: Astero
About the game: Overview Collect power ups, dodge threats, and blast away at asteroids and alien objects in this survival game. Enemies Asteroids , many alien objects and even UFO`s. Levels Go through the 20 levels and more to come soon. The game get more difficult to overcome as you progress through the levels. Power Items 4 Power up items can you encounter. Shield - give you protection. The shield life time is influenced by every hit you get but it disapear in time even if you are not hit. Life - regenerate a small percentage of your life. Fire Power 2 and 3 - it will give you 1 or 2 extra projectiles for a while. Other Features Collect as many points as possible. Boost your points with bonus levels. Fight and destroy strong bosses.
Meta Title: Astero: Aug 28, 2020, Antonio Man and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Astero? Check out the release date (Aug 28, 2020), developer insights from Antonio Man, and a complete game summary.
